OrgName: Sabre Travel Network, a division of Sabre GLBL Inc.
activities: The Sabre Global Distribution System, owned and operated by Sabre Travel Network, uses personal information of EU travelers, collected by its subscribing travel agents, to allow those travel agents to search, price, book, ticket, and manage travel services provided by travel suppliers, such as airlines, hotels, car rental companies, rail providers, and tour providers.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel & Director of Privacy
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data about European travelers processed through Sabre's Global Distribution System
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution, a division of the American Arbitration Association, Safe Harbor Program (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
